title: 이달의소녀탐구 #499 (LOONA TV #499)
summary:
Everyone just had lunch and now they are deciding who has to clean up so they play a game. The loser cleans up.
0:14 -- Choerry lost and has to clean up. - YeoJin: "LMAO!" - Choerry: "Oh man! I just wanted to beat YeoJin."
0:23 -- While cleaning up, she drops some chopsticks. Kim Lip tells that no one should help her just to mess around.
0:35 -- After the clean up, she practices the same game with JinSoul and Kim Lip and loses all the times.0:58 -- ChoeLip hug!
